00030 /* Limits imposed by the USB peripheral */
00031 #define NP_RX_QUE_DEPTH       8
00032 #define HP_RX_QUE_DEPTH       8
00033 #define MAX_XFER_LEN          524287L         /* 2^19 - 1 bytes             */
00034 #define MAX_PACKETS_PR_XFER   1023            /* 2^10 - 1 packets           */
00035 #if defined( _USB_DIEPTXF6_MASK )
00036   #define MAX_NUM_TX_FIFOS      6             /* In addition to EP0 Tx FIFO */
00037   #define MAX_NUM_IN_EPS        6             /* In addition to EP0         */
00038   #define MAX_NUM_OUT_EPS       6             /* In addition to EP0         */
00039   #define MAX_DEVICE_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS 512U
00040 #else
00041   #define MAX_NUM_TX_FIFOS      3             /* In addition to EP0 Tx FIFO */
00042   #define MAX_NUM_IN_EPS        3             /* In addition to EP0         */
00043   #define MAX_NUM_OUT_EPS       3             /* In addition to EP0         */
00044   #define MAX_DEVICE_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS 384U
00045 #endif
00046 #define MIN_EP_FIFO_SIZE_INWORDS  16U         /* Unit is words (32bit)      */
00047 #define MIN_EP_FIFO_SIZE_INBYTES  64U         /* Unit is bytes (8bit)       */

00051 #define USB_VBUS_SWITCH_NOT_PRESENT
00052 #endif

00054 /* Limit imposed by the USB standard */
00055 #define MAX_USB_EP_NUM      15
00056 
00057 #if defined( USB_DEVICE )
00058   /* Check power saving modes. */
00059   #ifndef USB_PWRSAVE_MODE
00060     /* Default powersave-mode is OFF. */
00061     #define USB_PWRSAVE_MODE  USB_PWRSAVE_MODE_OFF
00062   #else
00063     #if ( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE                                               &  \
00064           ~( USB_PWRSAVE_MODE_ONSUSPEND | USB_PWRSAVE_MODE_ONVBUSOFF |      \
00065              USB_PWRSAVE_MODE_ENTEREM2                                 )    )
00066       #error "Illegal USB powersave mode."
00067     #endif
00068   #endif /* ifndef USB_PWRSAVE_MODE */
00069 
00070   /* Check power saving low frequency clock selection. */
00071   #ifndef USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK
00072     /* Default clock source is LFXO. */
00073     #define USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK_LFXO
00074   #else
00075     #if ( ( USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK != USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK_LFXO  ) &&  \
00076           ( USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK != USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK_LFRCO )     )
00077       #error "Illegal USB 32kHz powersave clock selection."
00078     #endif
00079   #endif /* ifndef USB_USBC_32kHz_CLK */
00080 #endif /* defined( USB_DEVICE ) */
00081

00086     #define USB_VBUSOVRCUR_PIN        2
00087     #define USB_VBUSOVRCUR_POLARITY   USB_VBUSOVRCUR_POLARITY_LOW
00088   #endif
